options.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/react-ts-remote/webpack.config.js --mode production

development.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/react-ts-remote/webpack.config.js --mode development

production.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/react-ts-remote/webpack.config.js --mode production

options.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/react-ts-remote/webpack.config.js --mode development --port 3005

development.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/react-ts-remote/webpack.config.js --mode development --port 3005

production.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/react-ts-remote/webpack.config.js --mode production --port 3005 --no-hot
